H0.text: With what group are Bobby Seale and Huey P. Newton associated. Black Liberation Army

H1.text: With what group are Bobby Seale and Huey P. Newton associated. Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee

H2.text: With what group are Bobby Seale and Huey P. Newton associated. Nation of Islam

H3.text: With what group are Bobby Seale and Huey P. Newton associated. BPPSD

A4.text: Newton and Seale decided to adopt the Black Panther logo and form their own organization called the Black Panther Party for Self-Defense.
